{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3473462,"name":"","username":"Rosie_Girl","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rosie_girl/{size}/239066_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-07T02:41:34.590Z","cooked":"

Has anyone seen Ri3D designs that include a climber? It seems like most focused on scoring algae and coral, not climbing. I’m looking for a place to start, so feel free to give any ideas of how to climb. Huge shout out to Ri3D teams for all you do!

Did some RI3d had managed to successfully build a deep cage climb Technical
Check out RustHOUNDS Ri3D! [REEFSCAPE Ri3D RustHOUNDS | Deep cage climb testing!]

I will say, there seems to be a LOT of overthinking this climb thing.
